Banner.Description: I possess extensive hands-on experience as a website and mobile app developer, specializing in Angular, Flutter, React, React Native, and Next.js. I excel at crafting clean, scalable code and developing robust systems and intuitive interfaces that enhance user experience. My commitment to industry best practices ensures the creation of reusable and maintainable code. Passionate about optimizing digital solutions, I consistently deliver exceptional results that push the boundaries of innovation.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a developer, I am committed to continuous improvement. I excel in performing continuous integration and covering frontend developer roles with Angular, Flutter, React, React Native, and Next.js. I am part of a team that values empathy, motivation, and collaboration to set plans and goals together.
My skills include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and executing ideas that add value to the projects I'm involved in.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Engineer
Description: Working as a Full Stack Engineer at Upstart Commerce, focusing on both frontend and backend development.
Developing and maintaining web applications using Next.js, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Integrating with third-party APIs and implementing user authentication for secure access.
Conducting code reviews and contributing to a culture of continuous improvement.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Remote Frontend Developer at ASM Tech Office
Developed and maintained a web-based application for a Tax Office using Angular, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Integrated RESTful APIs of NestJS to support multiple applications, using Angular for frontend development.
Built a real-time chat application using WebSockets and Angular, enhancing communication and collaboration among team members.
Implemented continuous integration and daily backups.
Successfully led the development of two frontend projects for the Tax Office platform, utilizing Angular and Angular Material.
Conducted planning meetings and generated reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Engineer
Description: Remote Frontend Engineer at Trillo Inc
Angular Developer
Created user-friendly and responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
Utilized UI design tools such as Figma.
Built reusable code for future use.
Gathered feedback and built solutions for users and customers.
Optimized web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
Flutter Developer
Developed Android and iOS mobile applications.
Optimized UI for various mobile device sizes.
Integrated 3D models.
Integrated APIs and Micro-Services.
Designed ergonomic and user-friendly UI.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend Intern
Description: Designed, developed, and maintained high-quality and reliable Python code.
Updated design specifications and source code for the ERP system.
Collaborated with the technical team to improve application performance features.
Performed hardware integration.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects I have contributed to
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: One Diamond Marketing
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: One Diamond Marketing presents a revolutionary project boasting seamless integration of Syncfusion Calendar, dynamic charts, JSON to PDF conversion, optimized performance, and robust authentication. Angular Reactive Forms are also implemented. Experience the future of marketing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: One Diamond (Mobile Application)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: One Diamond Marketing Mobile Application allows clients to view their details on a mobile app. It boasts seamless integration of Syncfusion Calendar, dynamic charts, JSON to PDF conversion, optimized performance, and robust authentication. Angular Reactive Forms are also implemented. Experience the future of marketing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Pak Foods! (e-commerce website)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: PakFood, my personal project, is an exciting e-commerce website for food lovers. Explore a curated selection of delicious dishes, including Pakistani cuisine. Enjoy convenient online shopping and order from the comfort of your home. Discover the joy of PakFood today. It includes a  Checkout page, Proceed Order, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Multi-Tasker (Mobile App)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This platform offers a solution for tradesmen, enabling them to find their next task without difficulty or waiting for their next project. It resolves the dilemma of tradesmen who prefer not to work for a company where they receive a salary but are still required to work. It includes features like report,  order history, Post Task, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Multi-Tasker - Admin Panel
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This admin panel for the multi-tasker application empowers administrators to efficiently manage users, tasks, payments, support, and platform security. It includes features such as user management, reporting and analytics, payment management, security and permissions, dashboard, and review and rating management.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: For more personal projects, visit my GitHub

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
